item.title: Investigative Reworks
item.dc:creator: TinyDeer
item.description:
NightX:

Night Ability: Escort: Determine a player’s class type. 2 uses.

Observer’s peek is strong enough - we don’t need a second one. Plus, peeks are why we got rid of the King’s Allies.

NightX:

Day Ability: Service: Determine if your target has royal blood. 2 uses.

So the Maid would use this during the day? I’d use it on 5 and immediately get a result?

NightX:

Night Ability: Matchmake: Determine if 2 players are compatible. Unlimited uses.

People with Royal Blood are not compatible
Fool and King are not compatible with anyone
Mercenary is compatible with their target
Other than that, they’re compatible if they are of the same faction.

I like this idea a lot, but hard to see how it would be user-friendly outside of Forum of Lies. There’s not a whole lot of time in-game to figure these kinds of things out, no matter how much it fits in a game of social deduction. So I’m conflicted here. I would rather have this than Peek/Escort because it’s definitely useful in the right hands.

NightX:

Night Ability: Gossip: Determine the faction of two players. Unlimited uses.

This seems incredibly strong.

NightX:

Day ability: Expose - You are told the next player to use a day ability besides King. 2 uses.

This is as good as a peek. You see “5 has used a day ability” right before a TB and you instantly know who is Fool/Scorned.

Read full topic

item.title: Investigative Reworks
item.dc:creator: NightX
item.description:
Main Thread

Investigative Reworks:

Maid (Blue Dragon Investigative)

Day Ability: Service: Determine if your target has royal blood. 2 uses.

Night Ability: Escort: Determine a player’s class type. 2 uses.

Night Ability: Matchmake: Determine if 2 players are compatible. Unlimited uses.

  • People with Royal Blood are not compatible
  • Fool and King are not compatible with anyone
  • Mercenary is compatible with their target
  • Other than that, they’re compatible if they are of the same faction.

Mistress (Unseen Investigative)

Day Ability: Service: Determine if your target has royal blood. 2 uses.

Night Ability: Escort: Determine a player’s class type. 2 uses.

Night Ability: Gossip: Determine the faction of two players. Unlimited uses.

Seeker (Cult Investigative)

Day ability: Expose - You are told the next player to use a day ability besides King. 2 uses.

Night ability 1: Identify - Learn the targets faction and class type. 3 uses.

Night ability 2: Gaze - Learn who the target visits and who visits them. 2 uses.
